casebody.data:
ABDO
v.
KAHN CONSTRUCTION CO. No. 34P08-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. G. Gray Wilson, J. Chad Bomar, Winston-Salem, Lorin J. Lapidus, for Kahn Construction, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of November 2008 by Plaintiffs to Strike:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
